title: C# Level 1 â€” Basics & Console Output
intro: This level introduces the basic structure of a C# console application and simple output using Console.WriteLine.
points: Understand the structure of a C# program with namespace, class, and Main method.
Use Console.WriteLine to print text and values to the console.
Know where the program starts executing (Main method).
Use single-line and multi-line comments in C#.
Compile and run simple C# console applications.
